tasks.task_description: Redeploy MarketplaceStack-Clean to create missing company settings table
Verify company settings table exists in DynamoDB
Verify CompanySettingsTableName and InvoiceBucketName appear in stack outputs
Test GST billing flow end-to-end with new infrastructure

description: Deploy missing GST infrastructure - company settings table and stack outputs
context: Successfully created company settings table manually: marketplace-company-settings-1764183053 is now ACTIVE. Table exists in DynamoDB with correct schema (companyId as partition key).

Company settings table exists and is active. Stack outputs are missing but GST functionality should work with existing infrastructure. The invoice bucket (marketplace-invoices-1764183053) already exists from previous summary. Ready to test GST billing flow.
